question: Doctor told me you are off till Monday I have an appointment at 10 do I still go to work before I see him?
question_content: Doctor told me you are off till Monday I have an appointment at 10 do I still go to work before I see him?

answers.answer_content: If you have missed work since the Doctor told you were off then no do not go to work before you see him. You will need a release for the insurance and your employer...

Here's a list of activities you could do instead of going to the doctors:

-Finish the Twilight series
-Watch High School Musical 1, 2, and 3
-Paint your nails
-Shave your cooch
-Hit on the mail man
-Unless it's a woman and you swing that way, then go on  ahead and do the previous
-make a pineapple-upside-down cake
-Prank call Sarah Palin
-Watch "Who's Nailin' Paylin"
-Go out to lunch with your gay best friend
-Learn how to tap dance
-Go to Disney World
-Write a novel
-....and many more!!

Take your pick....
I keep reading your question, but it doesn't make sense to me. I'm sorry.
